description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Settings' that renders a user settings page for selecting language and age group preferences. It interacts with authentication and language context hooks, and updates user preferences accordingly.

methods.name: Settings()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the Settings page for user preferences.

methods.name: handleAgeChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the age group selection, updating the user context.

methods.name: handleLangChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the language selection, updating language context and user preferences.
